titleStmt.title: A letter from W.B. in the city, to his friend at Warwick
titleStmt.author: W. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the importunity of some loyal gentlemen for I.H. ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: September 1, W.B.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
